page.title: 02Torquay Population
page.content: Torquay has a very large number of residents who are from other parts of the British Isles as well as from other countries.A large proportion of these have settled here on retirement. Many hoteliers,shop keepers and restaurant owners and workers are from outside the area. There are also a number of migrant workers who come to the area for seasonal holiday work. The requirements of the elderly residents particularly their medical needs has led to an expansion of hospital facilities and the establishment of many private residential homes. There are still many people who can claim to be Devon locals however.Many of these live in the older parts of the town and the old village centres which are now suburban Torquay.
